title: Does being a top ranked putter equate to PGA tournament success?
text:
text here……


Code
library(tidyverse)
library(ggtext)
library(ggalt)
library(ggrepel)

sgputting <- read_csv("sgputting.csv") |> filter(is.na(RANK) == FALSE)

sgpto10 <- sgputting |> 
  top_n(10, wt=AVG)

wr <- read_csv("worldrankings.csv") |> filter(is.na(NK) == FALSE)

top100 <- wr |> top_n(100, wt=-NK)

tm <- top100 |> filter(PLAYER== "Taylor Montgomery")
pm <- top100 |> filter(PLAYER== "Peter Malnati")
mp <- top100 |> filter(PLAYER== "Matthieu Pavon")
js <- top100 |> filter(PLAYER== "Jordan Spieth")
abj <- top100 |> filter(PLAYER== "Alexander Björk")
jsu <- top100 |> filter(PLAYER== "Justin Suh")
bt <- top100 |> filter(PLAYER== "Brendon Todd")

ggplot() +
  geom_point(data=top100, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`), color="lightgrey") +
  geom_point(data=tm, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`), color="red") +
  geom_point(data=pm, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`), color="red") +
  geom_point(data=mp, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`), color="red") +
  geom_point(data=js, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`), color="red") +
  geom_point(data=abj, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`), color="red") +
  geom_point(data=jsu, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`), color="red") +
  geom_point(data=bt, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`), color="red") +
  geom_text_repel(data=tm, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`, label=PLAYER)) +
   geom_text_repel(data=pm, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`, label=PLAYER)) +
   geom_text_repel(data=mp, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`, label=PLAYER)) +
   geom_text_repel(data=js, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`, label=PLAYER)) +
   geom_text_repel(data=abj, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`, label=PLAYER)) +
   geom_text_repel(data=jsu, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`, label=PLAYER)) +
   geom_text_repel(data=bt, aes(x=NK, y=`AVG POINTS`, label=PLAYER)) +
  labs(
    x="Golf world rankings",
    y="Average Points",
    title="Top putters compared to the top 100 golfers in the world",
    subtitle="Being a top 10 putter does not necesarily mean PGA Tour success.",
    caption="Source:pgatour.com | By: Sage Schulte"
  ) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 18, face = "bold"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 14), 
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size=10), 
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
    plot.title.position = "plot"
    ) 









more text here


Code
sgputting100 <- sgputting |> top_n(100, wt=-RANK)

ss <- sgputting100 |> filter(PLAYER == "Scottie Scheffler")
rm <- sgputting100 |> filter(PLAYER == "Rory McIlroy")
wk <- sgputting100 |> filter(PLAYER == "Wyndham Clark") 
xs <- sgputting100 |> filter(PLAYER == "Xander Schauffele") 

ggplot()+
  geom_point(data=sgputting100, aes(x=RANK, y=AVG), color="lightgrey") +
  geom_point(data=ss, aes(x=RANK, y=AVG), color="green") +
  geom_point(data=rm, aes(x=RANK, y=AVG), color="green") +
  geom_point(data=wk, aes(x=RANK, y=AVG), color="green") +
  geom_point(data=xs, aes(x=RANK, y=AVG), color="green") +
   geom_text_repel(data=ss, aes(x=RANK, y=AVG, label=PLAYER)) +
   geom_text_repel(data=rm, aes(x=RANK, y=AVG, label=PLAYER)) +
   geom_text_repel(data=wk, aes(x=RANK, y=AVG, label=PLAYER)) +
   geom_text_repel(data=xs, aes(x=RANK, y=AVG, label=PLAYER)) +
  labs(
    x="Putting rank",
    y="Strokes gained average",
    title="Top golfers in the wolrd rankings compared to the best putters",
    subtitle="Golfers do not have to be great at putting to be a top ranked player.",
    caption="Source:pgatour.com | By: Sage Schulte"
  ) +
  theme_classic() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 14, face = "bold"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 12), 
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size=10), 
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
    ) 









more text here


Code
t10finishes <- read_csv("top10fs.csv")

puttt10f <- t10finishes |> 
  filter(PLAYER=="Matthieu Pavon"|PLAYER== "Jordan Spieth"|PLAYER== "Brendon Todd"|PLAYER== "Peter Malnati")

ggplot() +
geom_dumbbell(
  data=puttt10f,
  aes(y=reorder(PLAYER,`TOP 10`), x=`TOP 10`, xend=`1ST`),
  size = 2,
    colour = "grey",
    colour_x = "orange",
    colour_xend = "green") +
  theme_minimal() +
   labs(
     x= "Best tournament finishes this season",
     y= "Golfers",
    title="Top 10 and first place finishes for top putters", 
    subtitle = "Number of <span style = 'color:green;'>first</span> place finishes this season. Number of <span style = 'color:orange;'>top 10</span> finishes.",
  caption="Source:pgatour.com | By: Sage Schulte"
  ) +
  theme(
    plot.subtitle = element_textbox_simple(),
    plot.title = element_text(size = 14, face = "bold"),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 12),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
    )
